title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 108.2 - Rights of party denied copying; access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 108.2 - Rights of party denied copying; access to records

State Regulations

If access to a record is denied, such denial may be
appealed to the Thruway Authority executive director, or his or her
designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
108.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
